Desc.entry: A support group designed to help people in Spiritual crisis or emergency. Spiritual emergence is aterm used to describe someone undergoing a process of spiritual transformation. Sometimes this process can be overwhelming and challenging for the individual, symptons can include both psychological and physical elements such as psychotic states, intense fear, sensitivity to food and environments, and periods of high energy followed by fatigue. The group aims to support people going through this process and is also open to anyone interested in spirtuality weather from a religious or non-religioius background
